- instructions (array of strings): Each step as a numbered instruction string. Example: ["1. Preheat oven to 375Â°F.", "2. Season the chicken."]

IMPORTANT:
- Convert all metric measurements to imperial
- Standardize ingredient formatting: quantity + unit + ingredient name
- If quantities are missing, note "to taste" or estimate reasonable amounts
- Return ONLY valid JSON, no markdown code fences or extra text

Recipe text:
{{ $json.recipeText }}"
    }
  ]
